member.summary: Gets or sets whether a frame is responsible for managing its own navigation history, or whether it integrates with the Web browser journal.
member.returns: A value that specifies whether frame manages its own journal. The default value is .
member.exception: A nested frame or more than one frame attempts to integrate with browser journal.

member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.summary: Occurs when a new navigation is requested.

member.summary: Occurs when an error is encountered while navigating to the requested content.

member.summary: Occurs when a navigation is terminated by either calling the method, or when a new navigation is requested while the current navigation is in progress.

member.summary: Defines methods for loading content that corresponds to a URI.

member.summary: Begins asynchronous loading of the content for the specified target URI.
member.returns: An object that stores information about the asynchronous operation.
member.param: The URI to load content for.
The URI that is currently loaded.
The method to call when the content finishes loading.
An object for storing custom state information.

member.summary: Attempts to cancel content loading for the specified asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified URI can be loaded.
member.returns: true if the URI can be loaded; otherwise, false.
member.param: The URI to test.
The URI that is currently loaded.

member.summary: Completes the asynchronous content loading operation.
member.returns: An object that represents the result of the asynchronous content loading operation.
member.param: An object that identifies the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership
member.summary: Specifies the type of journal used by the frame.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.Automatic
member.summary: If the control is a top-level frame, it integrates with the browser journal; otherwise, it maintains its own journal.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.OwnsJournal
member.summary: The maintains its own journal. This option can be used with any .

member.name: F:System.Windows.Navigation.JournalOwnership.UsesParentJournal
member.summary: The integrates with the browser journal. This option can be used only with a top-level ; otherwise, an exception is thrown.

member.summary: Represents the content loaded by an implementation.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and sets the property to the specified object.
member.param: The loaded page.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and sets the property to the specified object.
member.param: The URI to redirect navigation to.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Navigation.LoadResult.LoadedContent
member.summary: Gets the loaded page.
member.returns: The loaded page.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Navigation.LoadResult.RedirectUri
member.summary: Gets the URI to redirect navigation to.
member.returns: The URI to redirect navigation to.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationCacheMode
member.summary: Specifies how the page is cached when used within a frame.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationCacheMode.Disabled
member.summary: The page is never cached and a new instance of the page is created on each visit.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationCacheMode.Required
member.summary: The page is cached and the cached instance is reused for every visit regardless of the cache size for the frame.

member.name: F:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationCacheMode.Enabled
member.summary: The page is cached, but the cached instance is discarded when the size of the cache for the frame is exceeded.

member.summary: Represents the state of a navigation operation.

member.returns: true if the event has been handled; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Navigation.UriMapper
member.summary: Converts a uniform resource identifier (URI) into a new URI based on the rules of a matching object specified in a collection of mapping objects.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Navigation.UriMapper.MapUri(System.Uri)
member.summary: Converts a specified uniform resource identifier (URI) into a new URI based on the rules of a matching object in the collection.
member.returns: A URI to use for handling the request instead of the value of the parameter. If no object in the collection matches , the original value for is returned.
member.param: Original URI value to be converted to a new URI.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Navigation.UriMapper.UriMappings
member.summary: Gets a collection of objects that are used to convert a uniform resource identifier (URI) into a new URI.
member.returns: A collection of objects that are used to convert URI values.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Navigation.UriMapperBase
member.summary: Represents the base class for classes that convert a requested uniform resource identifier (URI) into a new URI based on mapping rules.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Navigation.UriMapperBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Navigation.UriMapperBase.MapUri(System.Uri)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, converts a requested uniform resource identifier (URI) to a new URI.
member.returns: A URI to use for the request instead of the value in the parameter.
member.param: The original URI value to be mapped to a new URI.

member.name: T:System.Windows.Navigation.UriMapping
member.summary: Defines the pattern for converting a requested uniform resource identifier (URI) into a new URI.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Navigation.UriMapping.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Navigation.UriMapping.MappedUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the uniform resource identifier (URI) that is navigated to instead of the originally requested URI.
member.returns: The URI that the requested URI is converted to.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Navigation.UriMapping.MapUri(System.Uri)
member.summary: Converts the specified uniform resource identifier (URI) to a new URI, if the specified URI matches the defined template for converting.
member.returns: The URI that has been converted or null if the URI cannot be converted.
member.param: The URI to convert.
member.exception: is null.-or- is null.-or- includes a query string.-or- includes a content fragment.

member.name: P:System.Windows.Navigation.UriMapping.Uri
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern to match when determining if the requested uniform resource identifier (URI) is converted to a mapped URI.
member.returns: The URI that will be converted.
